attributes.action: Stop smokers from Smoking in busy streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even though smokers are banned from smoking in public places, it doesn't stop them from hanging around doorways.  Therefor, in effect, passive smoking is still going on while people are walking in the streets.  Also, people are spoiling the streets by dropping the cigarette butts on the pavement.  Therefor, I suggest that the Government ban smoking in the streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
